>Hi, I was just wondering if someone could tell me about design
>patterns in JUnit, or some links to good sites for information.

Farenn,

As Dave said, the Cook's Tour does a good job of explaining what patterns 
are used in JUnit.  It's also interesting to study how the framework 
evolved after each major release.  Finally, if you're in the mood for 
workshop and have the budget, we review a good deal of patterns used in 
JUnit in The Design Patterns Workshop (Dec 9-12, 2002).

best regards
